--- Astrotrain / Dead-End / Drag Strip ---

Astrotrain lands at the Dark Avian, his radar shows that Cyclonus and 
the new decepticons are close behind, and should land immediately 
after him. His hatch opens to let Wildrider out.

Dead-End and Drag Strip are both getting quite bored. They heard the 
alarm sound and had ignored it for lack of care, but now the are 
getting curious. "I dunno bout you, Dead-End, but this is boring..." 
Dead-End looks over at his annoying ally, "I suppose that doing 
nothing would always get annoying eventually, but yes. Why don't we 
check out the alarm that sounded a little while ago." Drag Strip nods. 
Both bots get up and head towards the room that is holding 
Motormaster, and Slaughter. As they enter their eyes widden, and Drag 
Strip queries immediately, "Motormaster, why aren't you killing the 
intruder?" Dead-End thinks to himself, <<Maybe our surly leader has 
become a stupid wimp as of late? Nawww, something's up...>>


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Northlight" <domnijoeproductions2001@y...> wrote:
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> > Wildrider stays hunched over. "Yeah Yeah, whatever."
> 
> ::Blindchaos and Domnijoe::
> 
> The two new Decepticons sigh, Domnijoe a bit impatiently.
> "As I said..Cyclonus took off" she says. Her voice lights up. "and I'm 
> glad that the big bot is still around."
> 
> Northlight
> Domnijoe Production
